These all implies that food insecurity is still the persistent problem in the regionDeterminants of Households Vulnerability to Food Insecurity in even after the country has shown economic progress. A review of the literature on the household food insecurity Ethiopia： Econometric analysis of Rural and Urban Households shows that there are numbers of studies， which are limited to specific areas， carried out in Amhara region.
